content: --चर्यं {1} religious studentship, the life of celibacy passed by a Brāhmaṇa boy in studying the Vedas, he first stage or order of his life; अविप्लुतब्रह्मचर्यो गृहस्थाश्रममाचरेत् <ls>Ms. 3. 2</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">2. 249</ls>; <ls>Mv. 1. 24.</ls> {2} religious study, self-restraint. {3} celibacy, chastity, abstinence, continence. (--र्यः a religious student; see ब्रह्मचारिन्. (--र्या chastity, celibacy.
